name: Shadow Company
description:
SHADOW COMPANY is a scary 3D game where you have to escape while dodging your shadow.

In this game you have to analyze the environment. each element placed is an element to be taken into account. Would you be able to escape your shadow?

Because this shadow is part of you, if you die it will die too. She will try to take control of you. Your enemy is yourself.

This game playable with the mouse/Keyboard and controller.

CONTROLS KEYBOARD :

⭐ - MOUSE to Move Camera

⭐ - ZQSD to Move Player

⭐ - E to Interact

⭐ - CTRL to Crouch

CONTROLS Controller :

⭐ - RIGHT STICK to Move Camera

⭐ - LEFT STICK to Move Player

⭐ - X to Interact

⭐ - B to Crouch

TOOLS USED :

🔧 - Unreal Engine 4 (4.27.1)

🔧 - Audacity

🔧 - Blender
